name: One-To-Many

runs.name: Parent access
runs.description: Get organization name for the user 'Bill Gates'

initialJoinSQL: SELECT * FROM user u join organization o on u.org_id=o.id
solutionSQL:
SELECT u.*, o.name as org_name FROM user u join organization o on u.org_id=o.id
union SELECT '#ORG'+o.name as user, o.website FROM organization o
